title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 202-2.5 - Recordkeeping requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 202-2.5 - Recordkeeping requirements

State Regulations
(a) Each
facility subject to this Subpart shall maintain the following records for at
least five years: (1)
a copy of each emission
statement submitted to the department; and
(2)
records supporting how the information
submitted in the emission statement was determined, including any calculations, data, measurements, and estimates used. (b) These records shall be made available at
the facility to representatives of the department upon request, during normal
business hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
202-2.5

Amended

New

York State Register November 18, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 46, eff. 12/3/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
